packages.name: Math Editor
packages.description: A beautiful split-pane Markdown editor with synced-scroll and LaTeX support. When LaTeX is detected, makes external render network request.

packages.name: Overcast
packages.description: Overcast to become cloudy or dark — just like this theme.

packages.name: Simple Markdown Editor
packages.description: A Markdown editor with dynamic split-pane preview.

packages.name: GitHub Push
packages.description: Push note changes to a public or private GitHub repository, with options for file extension and commit message.

packages.name: Action Bar
packages.description: Useful utility bar with information about the current note as well as actions like duplicate, copy, and save.

packages.name: Dynamic
packages.description: A smart theme that minimizes the tags and notes panels when they are not in use.

packages.name: Advanced Markdown Editor
packages.description: A fully featured Markdown editor that supports live preview, a styling toolbar, and split pane support.

packages.name: Code Editor
packages.description: Syntax highlighting and convenient keyboard shortcuts for over 120 programming languages. Ideal for code snippets and procedures.

packages.name: Folders Component
packages.description: Create nested folders from your tags with easy drag and drop. Folders also supports Smart Tags, which allow you to build custom filters for viewing your notes.

packages.name: Simple Task Editor
packages.description: A great way to manage short-term and long-term to-do's. You can mark tasks as completed, change their order, and edit the text naturally in place.

packages.name: Plus Editor
packages.description: From highlighting to custom font sizes and colors, to tables and lists, this editor is perfect for crafting any document.

packages.name: FileSafe
packages.description: Encrypted attachments for your notes using your Dropbox, Google Drive, or WebDAV server. Limited to 50MB per file.

packages.name: Vim Editor
packages.description: A code editor with Vim key bindings.

packages.name: Titanium
packages.description: Light on the eyes, heavy on the spirit.

packages.name: Solarized Dark
packages.description: The perfect theme for any time.

packages.name: Focus
packages.description: For when you need to go in.

packages.name: No Distraction
packages.description: A theme for focusing on your writing.

packages.name: Minimal Markdown Editor
packages.description: A minimal Markdown editor with live rendering and in-text search via Ctrl/Cmd + F

packages.name: 2FA Manager
packages.description: Configure two-factor authentication to add an extra level of security to your account.
packages.deletion_warning: Deleting 2FA Manager will not disable 2FA from your account. To disable 2FA, first open 2FA Manager, then follow the prompts.

packages.name: TokenVault
packages.description: Encrypt and protect your 2FA secrets for all your internet accounts. TokenVault handles your 2FA secrets so that you never lose them again, or have to start over when you get a new device.

packages.name: Secure Spreadsheets
packages.description: A powerful spreadsheet editor with formatting and formula support. Not recommended for large data sets, as encryption of such data may decrease editor performance.

packages.name: Autobiography
packages.description: A theme for writers and readers.

packages.name: Midnight
packages.description: Elegant utilitarianism.

packages.name: Quick Tags
packages.description: Work more efficiently by quickly selecting from a live list of tags while you type. Supports keyboard shortcuts and folders.

packages.name: Futura
packages.description: Calm and relaxed. Take some time off.

packages.name: Bold Editor
packages.description: A simple and peaceful rich editor that helps you write and think clearly. Features FileSafe integration, so you can embed your encrypted images, videos, and audio recordings directly inline.
